trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""></xref> base class that can be implemented to verify an expected identity against an authorization context that represents a remote endpoint, or to create an identity from an endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""> </xref>基底類別可以實作驗證針對遠端端點，表示授權內容的預期身分識別，或從端點位址建立身分識別。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure calls the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IdentityVerifier.TryGetIdentity%2A> method first to retrieve the service's identity from the message.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]基礎結構會呼叫<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IdentityVerifier.TryGetIdentity%2A>方法以從訊息擷取服務的身分識別。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IdentityVerifier.TryGetIdentity%2A>

trans-unit.source: Next, the infrastructure calls the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IdentityVerifier.CheckAccess%2A> method with the returned <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext>.
trans-unit.target: 接下來，基礎結構會呼叫<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IdentityVerifier.CheckAccess%2A>方法的傳回<xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext>。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IdentityVerifier.CheckAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about implementing the class, see [How to: Create a Custom Client Identity Verifier](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需實作該類別的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to︰ 建立自訂用戶端身分識別驗證器](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Implements a method to verify an identity.
trans-unit.target: 實作方法，以驗證身分識別。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the identity is verified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果驗證身分識別。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a default instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個類別的預設執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Tries to create an identity from an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試從端點建立身分識別。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IdentityVerifier> creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.DnsEndpointIdentity> based on the hostname portion of <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress.Uri%2A> if an explicit <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity> has not been specified as part of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IdentityVerifier>建立<xref:System.ServiceModel.DnsEndpointIdentity>根據主機名稱部分，<xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress.Uri%2A>如果<xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity>尚未指定<xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>一部分</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity>明確</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress.Uri%2A>的</xref:System.ServiceModel.DnsEndpointIdentity></xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IdentityVerifier>預設值

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> to use for creating the identity.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the identity is returned; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果傳回身分識別。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
